Introducing Reibase

The future of open source infrastructure

Reibase provides a way to monetize open source projects, clearly define control of the project, and reward contributors giving back to the community.

LoadDistributeVote
Make open source your strength

Secure your open source dependencies

Invest in the project and have a seat at the table for future development

Incentivize valuable contributions

Take an active role in your favorite open source projects

Manage potential risk

Create transparency around code contributions and their supporters

Know your contributors

Build a community around open source projects

Value is shared

Reward contributors with part of the value they are creating.

Bus factor is zero

Others can now step in to assist and maintain a key open source project

Sophia d'Antoine

Co-founder and CEO

David Szigeti

Co-founder and CTO

Dorian Key

Co-founder and CFO

Jeffrey Wood

Co-founder

Our team here at Reibase is deeply invested in the open source ecosystem. Our diverse backgrounds in cybersecurity, software supply chains, web3, and open source prepared us for this mission; our history successfully starting and exiting companies will prepare us for success. Our expertise has led us all to the same thesis: Let’s fix open source and make it a welcome place for future contributors and consumers alike.

Join the [counter] revolution

CEO Sophia d'Antoine introduces Reibase 3 min
Techstars_ Crypto Boston April 2023
